intro.description: We specialize in Defense Base Act (DBA) claims, providing expert legal support for workers facing workplace injuries or illnesses.
intro.expertiseDesc: Our team has extensive experience in handling complex DBA cases, ensuring your rights are protected throughout the process.
intro.supportDesc: We guide you through every step of your claim, from initial filing to final resolution, with personalized attention to your case.

requirements.title: Application Requirements
requirements.description: To complete your application, we'll need the following documents. Please ensure you have these ready before proceeding.
requirements.warning: Your application may be delayed or cannot be completed if you're unable to upload the required documents.

documents.title: Passport and Travel Records
documents.description: Your passport and entry-exit records from the period you worked at the bases

documents.title: Employment Documents
documents.description: Documents showing your employment with the company and your position (employment contracts, assignment letters, etc.)

documents.title: Recognition Documents
documents.description: If available, any recognition, appreciation, or achievement certificates from your workplace

documents.title: Payment Records
documents.description: Bank statements or payment records showing your salary payments

requirements.note: All documents will be stored securely and used only for your application.

incidentForm.title: Describe Your Incident
incidentForm.description: Providing a detailed description of the incident that occurred during your time at the bases is crucial for evaluating your application.
incidentForm.label: Incident Description
tips: Try to specify the exact date (day/month/year) of the incident
Describe the location (which base, which section) where it occurred
Include names of people who were present during the incident
Detail the health issues you experienced
Mention the treatments you received and hospitals you visited afterward
